searchParameters.q: Mattel Children's Hospital at UCLA website

knowledgeGraph.title: UCLA Mattel Children's Hospital
knowledgeGraph.description: UCLA Mattel Children's Hospital at Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center is a nationally ranked pediatric acute care children's hospital located in Los Angeles, California.

organic.title: UCLA Mattel Children's Hospital, Los Angeles
organic.snippet: UCLA Mattel Children's Hospital, located within Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, shines as a beacon of excellence in pediatric care.

organic.title: UCLA Mattel Children's Hospital - About Our Hospital
organic.snippet: With a dedicated entrance from Gayley Avenue, UCLA Mattel Children's Hospital is located on the third and fifth floors of Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center.

organic.title: UCLA Mattel Children's Hospital | Clinical and Translational Science ...
organic.snippet: UCLA Mattel Children's Hospital cares for the physical and emotional well-being of children, from newborns to young adults.

organic.title: UCLA Mattel Children's Hospital | Mattel, Inc.
organic.snippet: The UCLA Mattel Children's Hospital is one of the top-ranked pediatric acute care children's hospitals in the United States. · Learn More at UCLA Health.

organic.title: UCLA Mattel Children's Hospital (@uclamch) - Instagram
organic.snippet: The official Instagram account of UCLA Mattel Children's Hospital. 757 Westwood Plaza, Los Angeles, California 90095
